questions.question: Steps of intubation sequence are: a. Flexion of lower cervical spine and extension of Atlanto-occipital joint b. Inflate cuff of endotracheal tube c. Introduce a laryngoscope from the right side of mouth d. Confirm the position of tube
questions.explanation: spine and extension of the atlanto-occipital joint. It is an optimal and ideal position for intubation (also called the Morning sniffing position). If you are a right-handed person then you will hold the laryngoscope in your left hand and start entering from the right side of patient’s mouth till you see the epiglottis, once the epiglottis is visible, push the epiglottis anteriorly in adults then vocal cords will be visible After this place the endotracheal tube, then inflate it. Cuff pressure should not exceed 25 Reference: Morgan & Mikhail’s Clinical Anesthesiology 7th Edition, Pdf Page 603-07
